# gauss_dx.dat
# This file is identical to gauss.dat, except that a column has been
#   added with a tiny energy uncertainty (dE). This file can be used to
#   confirm that a program that takes x errors into consideration gives
#   the same result as a normal least squares fit in the limit of small
#   x uncertainties
#
# E	dE	Count	Uncertainty
1171	0.001	11	3.31662479
